outputs.output_descr: Cooperate with the national commitment to implement the provisions of the Convention on Biological Diversity and protect its biological heritage for future generations, by providing technical support to the Ministry of Environment to formulate and implement the policy, action plan and program of biodiversity; establish and coordinate actions for management of genetic resources, promote sustainability of fishery resources, coordinate and integrate efforts to create and manage protected areas at the federal, state and municipal levels and to develop ex situ conservation, research and education in tropical botany.

project_descr: Sustentabilidade e Repartição dos Benefícios da Biodiversidade.
